bid Title | Class 5 Diesel Truck with Body
------------|-----------------------------
Bid Reference | WS4385888323-Doc4426123382
 Bid Status | Expiré
------------|-----------------------------

### Contract Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking a bid for the supply of eighteen (18) Class 5 Diesel Trucks Firm Quantity. The option for up to twelve (12) additional trucks is also available.

### Contract Description

Class 5 Diesel Trucks are required in two configuration variants: 

*   Aerodynamic Boat Hauler Body configuration as detailed in Annex C
*   Mobile Repair Truck Body (MRT) configuration as detailed in Annex D

### Bid Requirements

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before March 11, 2024 by 14:00 EDT.
*   Bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contract Address and Support

*   Contracting Entity:
    +   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    +   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   End User Entity:
    +   Department of National Defence (DND)
    +   101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contracting Entities' Trade and Economic Agreements

The following trade and economic agreements apply to this contract:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
*   North American Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

For any questions or information, please contact:

*   Legault, Jacques (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
